comments:
- Jeddah Removed from Class B - optical for class (A, B, and C - Network 5) to be up to 14 YO.
- Saudi German Hospital Jeddah. Cases that exceed the policy annual maximum limit or not covered.
- An aggregate limit of RS. 100,000 per policy period will be arranged by Tawuniya to cover serious Congenital Diseases/Deformities will be covered with an aggregate limit RS. 100,001 for whole policy.
- Reimbursement for dental optical will be allowed subject to policy terms and conditions.
- The following providers will be obtained for class B : - Saudi German Hospital - MakkaM. - LA SAEDEY HOSPITAL - AL MUOMAJ MAKKAM MEDICAL CENTER. - HSHKAB HOSPITAL - JEDDAH. - AL LAMA MEDICAL CLINICYPOL - YANBU AL BAHAR. - AL LAMA MEDICAL CLINICYPOL - YANBU INDUSTRIAL.
- The above conditions supersede any other terms and conditions.
- In case of parent inclusion in the offer on a selective basis, the specified prices shall apply exclusively to existing parents covered under the previous policy. Any additional parents not part of the scheme in the previous insurance year will be subject to the Health Declaration (HD) and any other required medical reports, and the grace period for the selective parent scheme shall not exceed 30 days.
- The network provider list is Tawuniya standard network. Any additional requirement for additional provider should be explicitly mentioned in the request of proposal and needs to be approved by Tawuniya Underwriting team.
- Tawuniya reserves the right to amend pricing in the event of any change in members distribution in the final list that exceeds 10% of the initial list.

sub_coverages.description: Treatment of root canals and emergencies
Appointed Pharmacy for Chronic Medications Supply
Organ Transplant for Heart and Liver (covered in KSA only)
Vaccination of Children as per MOH Specification
Repatriation of Mortal Remains to Home Country
Companion Expenses for Children less than 12 yrs. Old
Ear Piercing For Female New Born Babies
Cost of Acquired valvular heart disease
Expenses of Organs Donation Operation for the donor
New born babies national Preventive Program
Psychiatric Treatment for Acute Cases of Psychological Disorders
Expenses of Complication of Cardiac Valve replacement
screening for hearing Impairment and critical congenital heart malformation in newborns.
Costs of infant formula (baby milk powder) in need of medical care up to the age of 24 months to become free of charge.
Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) immunization program for children according to the Ministry of Health approved immunodeficiency virus vaccines schedule.
Delivery complications are covered up to the maximum benefit limit of this policy.
Cost of newborns coverage on the mother's policy up to a maximum of 30 days from the date of birth until they are added in the policy on retroactive basis from the date of birth
Adult Vaccination based on National Vaccination Schedule for Adults
Sexually transmeted diseases Include cover for Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genetic warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genetic herpes, Chancroid
The costs of complications resulting from a benefit treatment covered in the policy
